newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria offers 4.2 bln levs of discount T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria offers 4.2 bln levs of discount T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry offered a special issue of 4.2 billion levs worth of 49-day discount T-bills dated September 4 at an auction today, the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) said.
The paper was issued to cover principal and interest payments of around 24.3 billion levs on three treasury issues maturing today, a Finance Ministry official told Reuters.
The ministry raised some 6.5 billion levs through sales of three T-bill issues, all dated September 4, at auctions on August 30 and September 2.
